description: '''Jason Webley''' is an American musician known for his fusion of [[folk music|folk]], [[experimental music|experimental]], and [[alternative rock|alternative music]]. Webley plays the guitar and accordion, sometimes providing percussion by stomping or shaking a plastic vodka bottle filled with coins. Webley began his career performing solo, but has collaborated with a wide range of artists. He has also organized several commemorative concerts and events memorializing everything from tragedies in his hometown of [[Everett, Washington]], to [[tomato]]es.
